htmlBody: When you say asap do you mean to imply the prior applications will get priority?

Fantastic!

I hope there will be a way for people living in other continents to connect virtually?

.... so that in future there could be an event in China, India, Maldives etc?

(Maldives and Seychelles are among the easiest countries for all nationalities to get visas)
The U.S. event is the same weekend as the National Animal Rights Conference. Given that animal activism is generally described as one of the four primary cause areas, I'm sad to see this happen.
